org.cidrz.webapp.dynasite.logic
Interface PersistenceManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePersistenceManager, ClientSettingsManager, PatientManager
public interface PersistenceManager

Interface for all persistence operations

Method Detail

getAll

java.util.List getAll()
                      throws PersistenceException
Obtains all instances of the class this PersistenceManager handles, as determined when the implementation of this PersistenceManager was obtained from the PersistenceManagerFactory.

Returns:
A List of instances of the managed class.
Throws:
PersistenceException - If an error occurs in the persistence layer
